TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted but the long hair gets tangled in a jet engine and you get pulled into it.

I wish to regain the ability to Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V again.

granted but you cant stop using it

i wish for the ability to shapeshift

Granted, you shape shift into the shape of a cat and get stuck into cat shape. Then you get mistaken for a stray cat and "rescued" then adopted into a house where the children don't stop harassing you.

I wish to understand the KSP mechanics.

Granted. but you can't cut it.

I wish I was a Billionaire.

Granted, but you've just crashed the economy.

I wish for pizza.

(crap, ninja'd)

Granted but the pizza has a single black olive on it that turns out to be a black hole and you become spaghettified and then shrunk into a infinitely small space

I wish that humankind will have a bright future in space travel.

Granted, the future is bright; bright due to the sun getting 4 times as big of course!

I wish that KSP was the most best game ever.

Granted, its so popular that the developers have to make it more mainstream from all the online trolls. Basically, it would ruin the game

I wish to be a adult.

Granted. Your body is an adult, but you have a mentality of a 1-year old.

I wish I will now be a fully professional KSP player.

Granted, your become the best KSP player so NASA kidnaps you to become their new astronaut

I wish to increase my intelligence.

Granted, you are now the most intelligent person in the world, but now you know humanity's dirty, dark secrets, including your family's.

I wish that I had free healthcare.

Granted, you move the UK

I wish that I didn't have this intelligence now.

Granted. Mindflayer.

I wish for more carbine

Granted, your arrested for having to many weapons as they think your planning a attack.

I wish to be unable to be bored

Granted, but now you suffer depression instead

I wish the flag of Saint-Pierre and Miquelon was less terrible

Granted, now it's blank white.

I wish my sides didn't hurt from laughing so much over Holo's post

Granted, your sides spit open and your nerves break.

I wish I couldn't be annoyed so easily

Granted, they stop hurting because you fell unconscious due to a brutal rhincerous attack.

I wish that the UK's flag was Scandinavian.

granted now nothing annoys you,

I wish that people would edit their posts on the count to 50 thread

Granted, the edit it to 300 to beat the high score

I wish people cant be sniped in the 50 post thread

Granted, now they're not fun and they fail permamently.

I wish the UK's flag was scandinavian

Granted, now each country in the UK splits apart as their cross isn't on the flag

I wish that I could be prime minister

Granted, but you are the prime minister of Tuvalu and hence don't have very much influence on the international stage.

I wish German had no conjugations.

Granted, but now the German language does not exist.

I wish that everything was edible.

Granted, but now everyone has eaten everything in the world and now there is nothing left

I wish for people to be on more often.
